tool_description: Extracts document metadata including creation date, author, title, subject, keywords, and technical properties from various document formats.

document_format.description: Document format: pdf, docx, xlsx, pptx, txt, html

extract_custom_properties.description: Whether to extract custom document properties

extract_statistics.description: Whether to extract document statistics (word count, page count, etc.)

error_messages: Document not found: The specified document path does not exist or is not accessible.
Unsupported document format: The specified format is not supported for metadata extraction.
Metadata extraction failed: Unable to read metadata from the document file.
Corrupted document: The document appears to be damaged and metadata cannot be extracted.
usage: Provide document_path and document_format. Enable extract_custom_properties for application-specific metadata and extract_statistics for document metrics.

keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with document
